mapper.select: SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId, si.good, sc.cid, sc.userId, sc.comment, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid WHERE si.categoryId=${categoryId}

SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.good, si.userId, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost, sc.comment FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid WHERE si.sid = ${sid}

SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId, si.good sc.cid, sc.comment, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid WHERE si.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_info(name, tel, addr, openTime, closeTime, categoryId, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, ${categoryId}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO shop_product(sid, pname, cost) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(sid) from shop_info), #{pname}, ${cost});
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_info SET name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, addr = #{addr}, openTime = #{openTime}, closeTime = #{closeTime}, categoryId = ${categoryId} WHERE sid = ${sid}
UPDATE shop_info SET good = good+1 WHERE sid = ${sid}
